So, it's super expensive. And there are like 3-5 different indie showcases going on here as well. One of them was Wholesome Direct. You are also competing against a crapton of AAA games. The value from impressions alone cannot be ascertained immediately, but wishlists gathered were pretty high, even if not exactly as cost-effective as perhaps a FB ad drive would be. Steam page also sucked. The way they did it was not intuitive and TBH it kinda failed in regards to how other Steam pages are treated.
